Text: THAILAND COMMITTEE MEETING TO PLAN FOR PM THAKSIN NOV VISIT USABC CONFERENCE ROOM THURSDAY OCT PMTO MEMBERS USASEAN BUSINESS COUNCIL FROM FRANCES A ZWENIG SENIOR COUNTRY DIRECTOR USASEAN BUSINESS COUNCIL TH ST NW SUITE WASHINGTON DC DIRECT FAX email DATE OCTOBER SUBJECT THAILAND COMMITTEE TO MEET ON THURSDAY OCTOBER AT pm TO DISCUSS THE UPCOMING NOV TRIP TO WASHINGTON DC BY THAI PRIME MINISTER THAKSIN AND THE OPPORTUNTIES FOR COUNCIL MEMBERS INVOLVEMENT NOV COUNCIL DINNER AND USTHAILAND ECONOMIC FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT TO BE SIGNED PLEASE RSVP YOUR ATTENDANCE ON FORM BELOW SUMMARY Thailand Committee will meet at pm on Thursday October in the Councils Conference Room th St NW Suite Washington DC to begin the planning for the November visit of Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra to Washington PM Thaksin will be in Washington for official visits including one with President Bush on November and Washington will be his only US stop The Council will be the lead on hosting the dinner for the Prime Minister the evening of November and we will submit suggestions for the private sector section of the US Thailand Economic Framework which should be signed during the visit I Agenda for Thursday October meeting at PM in Councils Washington conference room A Bill Ichord and Ernie Bower debrief on their Friday October meeting with Thai Foreign Minister Surakiart in Shanghai during which they discussed the PMs trip at length B Discussion of PM Thaksin schedule in Washington on Nov and the US and Thai objectives for the visit C Discussion of the Council dinner and opportunities for interaction with the Thai delegation and sponsorship see below D Development of Private Sector input for the US Thailand Economic Framework which should be signed as part of the visit see below We are planning a major dinner for PM Thaksin and his delegation to be proceeded by a predinner CEO meeting on Friday evening November Please let me know if you are interested in a host sponsorship for the dinner at We will be asked to develop the Private Sector element of the US Thailand Economic Framework which will definitely follow the lines of much of what we pursued during our justcompleted Mission to Thailand October In addition we will be gathering infomation on any deals andor trainingcommunity support programs that could be signed or announced during the visit We hope to develop a better snapshot of current US investment in Thailand investment s number of employees educationtraininghuman resource development etc We found during our recent visit that no one the US Embassy AmCham seems to have this information Thoughts about how best to do this will be appreciated Please let me know if you have any questions and please respond on the form below if you would like to attend the meeting Thank you YES I WILL ATTEND THE MEETING AT THE COUNCIL AT PM TH ST NW SUITE DC NAME ORGANIZATION PHONEFAXemail Frances A Zwenig Senior Country Director USASEAN Business Council th Street NW Suite Washington DC fax email
